data.name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Sigmar's Blessing
data.detailed_description:
Sigmar’s Blessing has fallen upon Ubersreik, giving the heroes a chance to tweak the loot in their favour. Visit the Shrine of Solace to sacrifice unwanted loot and improve your arsenal, uncover brand new traits, and acquire weapons of the deadly Veteran Tier.

In this FREE DLC for Vermintide, we give you the power to modify your loot to better fit your favourite heroes. At the Shrine of Solace, you can use tokens to pick which tier and hero should receive your newly constructed weapon, change the chance of a trait happening, or replace the trait with another. This gives you the perfect chance to try out the five new traits added with the DLC.

Sigmar’s Blessing also introduces 40 new weapons that make up the deadly Veteran Tier.

Key Features

  • Pray and you shall Receive… Loot! - Few times has an altar answered your prayers quite so quickly as the Shrine of Solace. Offer up your Tokens, specify your wishes and pray!


  • 5 New Hero Trinkets - Wielding a Hero Trinket will improve your chances of receiving loot for the corresponding hero. To make the new hero trinkets extra shiny each one of them is accompanied by a Steam Achievement.


  • Forge 2.0 - Sigmar’s Blessing brings the ability to salvage Trinkets, Hats and Exotic Loot - as well as the ability to spend Tokens to increase your chances of receiving a specific weapon.


  • 40 New Veteran tier weapons - Shoot, stab, slice and burn the Skaven with these new Veteran weapons, the rarest of the tiers.

  • 5 New Traits - Diversify your arsenal with these brand new traits:

data.short_description: Pray and you shall Receive… Loot!. The first free DLC for Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide brings a slew of loot changes, including brand new ways to acquire loot, a new weapon tier and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8/8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9500 @ 2.83GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *WARNING: 32-bit OS is NOT officially supported at this time
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8/8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K @ 4.00 GHz or AMD FX-9590 @ 4.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *WARNING: 32-bit OS is NOT officially supported at this time
